resources.string: Scroll horizontally to see some places specially displayed for you where you may order some food.
Scroll horizontally to see other stores where you may order some food.
Scroll horizontally to see other nearby places where you may order some food.
It is the home icon that takes you to the main page of the app.
It is the cart icon that takes you to the screen where you may see which products you have added to it.
It is the restaurant logo of the last order made.
This has to be replaced by the associated restaurant.
It takes you to the previous page you were.
With this, you may exit the checkout screen.
Are you ready to place your order?
This increases the amount of units you want to buy from the specific product.
This eliminates the food item from your cart.
This is the image of the food item you are interested.
This removes the associated food item from your cart.
This is the layout of a food item in the shop.
This adds a food item to your cart.
This is the image of the food item you are interested.
Apples are nutritious. Apples may be good for weight loss. Apples may be good for your heart as they are part of a healthy and varied diet.
